description: Professional Aventus recreation by Fraterworks NZ Ltd. A fruity chypre formulation with proprietary blends and exact CAS numbers.

ingredients.name: Paradise Molecule (Fraterworks)
ingredients.notes: Fraterworks proprietary blend - likely Hedione-based

ingredients.name: Iso E Super
ingredients.notes: Woody backbone - 14% of formula. Original: Iso E Super (IFF)

ingredients.name: Helvetolide
ingredients.notes: Musk base - diffusive fruity character. Original: Helvetolide (Firmenich)

ingredients.name: Ambroxan
ingredients.notes: Ambroxan equivalent - ambergris note. Original: Ambrofix Crystals (Givaudan)

ingredients.name: Bergamot Oil
ingredients.notes: Furocoumarins-free citrus opening. Original: Bergamot Superior Oil FCF

ingredients.name: Dipropylene Glycol (DPG)
ingredients.notes: Solvent for dilutions - non-volatile

ingredients.name: Patchouli Oil (Heart Fraction)
ingredients.notes: Clean patchouli heart - main natural base. Original: Patchouli Heart MD PA50

ingredients.name: Linalyl Acetate
ingredients.notes: Lavender/bergamot ester - opening freshness

ingredients.name: Lyral
ingredients.notes: Lily aldehyde - floral radiance. Original: Lyral (IFF)

ingredients.name: Sweet Orange Oil
ingredients.notes: Sweet citrus - opening brightness

ingredients.name: Iso Ambrettolide
ingredients.notes: Musk - smooth animalic facet

ingredients.name: Petitgrain Bigarade Oil
ingredients.notes: Bitter orange leaves - green complexity

ingredients.name: Coranol
ingredients.notes: Green/metallic - adds freshness. Original: Coranol (Firmenich)

ingredients.name: Linalool
ingredients.notes: Soft floral/citrus - opening smoothness

ingredients.name: Pink Pepper Oil
ingredients.notes: Spicy/rosy - warm complexity. Original: Pink Peppercorn Oil

ingredients.name: Suralette Extra (Fraterworks)
ingredients.notes: Fraterworks proprietary - likely floral accord

ingredients.name: 2-Isobutyl Quinoline
ingredients.notes: Leather/animalic - 0.6% actual concentration

ingredients.name: Clary Sage Oil
ingredients.notes: Herbaceous/green - aromatic complexity. Original: Clary Sage Oil France

ingredients.name: Evernyl (Veramoss)
ingredients.notes: Oakmoss alternative - earthy depth. Original: Veramoss (IFF)

ingredients.name: Pineapple Supreme (Fraterworks)
ingredients.notes: Fraterworks pineapple accord - signature fruity note

ingredients.name: Blackcurrant Bud Absolute
ingredients.notes: Black currant - fruity/green facet, 1.5% actual. Original: Cassis Bud Absolute

ingredients.name: Alpha Damascone
ingredients.notes: Rose/fruity ketone - 0.3% actual concentration

ingredients.name: Neroli Oil
ingredients.notes: Orange blossom - premium floral touch. Original: Neroli Oil Tunisia P&N

ingredients.name: Birch Tar Oil (Rectified)
ingredients.notes: Smoky/leather - 0.02% actual, powerful impact

formulaNotes.proprietaryBlends: Paradise Molecule (230), Suralette Extra (6), Pineapple Supreme (5) - Total 241 parts (24.1%)
formulaNotes.coreStructure: Similar backbone to Basenotes formula but with proprietary modifications
formulaNotes.professionalGrade: Uses exact supplier specifications and CAS numbers
formulaNotes.concentration: Formula designed to be diluted to 30% for original 2010 Aventus strength
keyDifferences: Paradise Molecule replaces individual Hedione measurement
Suralette Extra - unknown proprietary floral blend
Pineapple Supreme - simplified vs individual pineapple components
Ambrofix instead of Ambroxan (same molecule, different supplier)
Higher Lyral content (30 vs 33 in original)

supplierNotes.Fraterworks: Paradise Molecule, Suralette Extra, Pineapple Supreme

usage.batchPreparation: Use this formula at 300 parts per 1000 parts ethanol for 30% concentration
usage.testBatch: For 10ml test: 3ml of this formula + 7ml ethanol
usage.vintage2010Match: Designed to replicate original 2010 Aventus batch 844456A
